values: If someone or something is stricken by a disease or problem, they are badly affected by it.
The pilot landed the stricken airplane with difficulty.

trans.values: a.被打中的，被击伤的；受灾的，受侵袭的

values: adj.被打击的,受挫的,患病的,受灾的v.打击(strike的过去分词)
adj. 受灾的, 遭损害的；经受或不堪…之苦的
患病的；受挫折的；受…侵袭的；遭殃的
